definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: To hand, some of it inevitably sticks to the fingers that it touches.
sentences.chinese: 這筆款幾經轉手，必然有一部分被經手人染指。

sentences.english: Working days start from the date receiving this form.
sentences.chinese: 以經手人收到申請單之日期爲工作天之起算日。
